title: Creamy Marinated Artichoke Dip
description: A warm and flavorful dip perfect for sharing, combining tender marinated artichokes with rich cheeses and savory spices.

ingredients.item: Marinated artichoke hearts, drained and chopped

instructions.instruction: In a large mixing bowl, combine the softened cream cheese, mayonnaise, sour cream, 3/4 cup of the Parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese, minced garlic, and black pepper. Mix until well combined and smooth.
Fold in the drained and chopped marinated artichoke hearts.
Transfer the mixture to a small oven-safe baking dish (around 8x8 inches or similar).
Sprinkle the remaining 1/4 cup of Parmesan cheese over the top of the dip.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the dip is hot, bubbly, and lightly golden brown on top.
Remove from oven and let stand for a few minutes before serving.
Garnish with fresh chopped parsley, if desired, and serve warm with your favorite dippers.

author: Chowboy AI
